about_the_game:
THE SAW IS THE LAW.



Meat Saw is a 30-40 minute horror experience inspired by the 80's slasher movie genre. You play as Amy Chambers, a young woman on her way to the Black Ridge Mountains to meet with her friends for a weekend of camping. The forest holds more than just a good time for her and her friends. Try and escape while a maniac with a chainsaw forged with the flesh of its victims descends upon them. The saw beckons and it must feed. Will she survive the night? Only time will tell.



Solve puzzles and riddles with clues and tools which allows for engaging and fun game mechanics.




Survive the horrors that await you in Meat Saw, while being stalked by a relentless AI hellbent on trying to end your life in a gruesome manner.

content_descriptors.notes: Meat Saw features a dark and heavy atmosphere with frequent violence and gore. This game is not for the faint hearted.

name: Meat Saw

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8GHz / AMD Athlon X2 64 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9600K CPU @ 3.70GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070

short_description: Amy Chambers, a young woman on her way to the Black Ridge Mountains to meet with her friends for a weekend of camping will soon find that the forest holds more than just a good time for her and her friends. The saw beckons and it must feed.
